title: Almond and raspberry sponge
ingredients: ['175g (6 oz) butter or margarine', '175g (6 oz) caster sugar', '175g (6 oz) self raising flour', '55g (2 oz) ground almonds', '3 medium eggs', '1 dessertspoon almond extract', '1 pinch salt', '1 splash of milk if needed', 'raspberry jam', '2 handfuls flaked almonds']
